name: ItemPal
0:
”Alexa, tell Item Pal I put notebook on the desk”
”Alexa, ask Item Pal where is my notebook”
”Alexa, tell Item Pal move notebook to backpack”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: item pal
des:
Having trouble to remember where you put your stuff? Now with the help from Item Pal no need to worry about it.
Simply tell Item Pal where you put your stuff She will mark it down for you.

To get started say one of the following commands:
1. "Tell / ask Item Pal I put {something} in/on {somewhere}" 
2. "Tell / ask Item Pal where is {something}"
3. "Tell / ask Item Pal move {something} to {somewhere}"
4. "Tell / ask Item Pal to remove {something} from {somewhere}"
5. "Tell / ask Item Pal find all items"


*If you are having trouble to add items to a specific location, please create a support ticket along with your command.
**Beware if you disable the skill all records will be gone
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
